Daily digest at 8:00: important emails + what to reply to today.
'Inbox zero' - triage: archive, tag, keep only important ones.
Unsubscribe from newsletters and spam cleanup (with preview + consent).
Automatic follow-ups: if no reply in 3 days - draft and reminder.
VIP alert: SMS/Slack/Email when a specific client or investor writes.
Extract invoices from emails to Drive + index in Sheets.
Turn emails into task list (Jira/HubSpot notes/Google Docs) with deadlines.
Detect 'hard risks': emails with phrases 'cancel', 'terminate', 'lawyer'.
Collect threads about one client and create 'customer brief' in Google Docs.
Draft replies in your style (short/diplomatic/aggressive).
Automatic rules: label emails by domains/topics.
Weekly 'who owes me a reply' (list in artifacts / email).
Transform email thread into 1-pager: decisions + open questions.
Detect 'urgent' by content, not by flags (semantically).
Extract leads from sales emails to HubSpot.
Schedule meeting: find 3 time slots and send proposals.
Automatic briefs: 15 min before meeting 'who is X + last contact'.
After meeting: notes + action items + follow-up email draft.
'No-meetings blocks': block deep work and make sure calls don't sneak in.
Weekly time report: hours of meetings, with whom, by category.
Catch conflicts and suggest rescheduling.
'Calendar hygiene': remove duplicates, add links, fix titles.
Automatic reminders to prepare for key calls.
'Overload signal': detect weeks > X hours of meetings and suggest cuts.
Create 'operating cadence': weekly rituals (exec sync, 1:1, review).
Drive audit: top largest folders/files + duplicates.
Organize 'Contracts' folder: naming + dates + index in Sheets.
Find 'final_final_v7' files and recommend the right version.
Backup key folders to another location.
Automatically tag/label files by type (contract, invoice, proposal).
Prepare audit package: list + zip + description.
Move attachments from Gmail to appropriate Drive folders.
'Drive watcher': when new PDF arrives - extract data and add to Sheets.
Create public link for selected files + permission control (safely).
Detect files with no owner / with weird share settings.
Create 'Weekly update' template and fill it automatically each week.
Write post-meeting notes and send to stakeholders.
Generate 'Product one-pager': problem, solution, ICP, pricing.
Prepare 'Investor update' (monthly) with data + narrative.
Create SOP document: onboarding, sales, support, ops.
'Doc lint': detect missing sections, inconsistencies, fix style.
Gather requirements and create PRD / spec in company standard.
Extract action items from multiple documents and make one list.
Prepare policies: security, incident response, data retention.
Turn scattered notes into one 'starter wiki'.
Build KPI dashboard in Sheets (ARR/MRR, churn, NRR, pipeline).
Automatically import data (from CSV/PDF) into Sheets tables.
Clean spreadsheets: duplicates, dates, currency formats, normalization.
Forecast: simple sales and cashflow model with charts.
Invoice register: payment deadlines, status, reminders.
Compare vendor offers: table + scoring.
Deal review table: stage, value, next step, owner, risk.
'Cohort analysis' of clients in Sheets (e.g. >12m vs <=12m).
Generate CSV for CRM import.
Alerts: if metric exceeds threshold, send email/SMS.
'Deal hygiene': deals without next step / without date / without owner.
Daily 'Top 10 to do': follow-ups + ready messages.
Detect deals stuck > X days in stage and suggest actions.
Create pipeline report: WoW changes, risks, key movements.
Automatically fill deal notes based on emails/meetings.
Unify properties: missing fields, wrong values, cleanup.
Customer segmentation: churn risk, growth potential, health score.
'Renewals tracker': who has renewal in 30/60/90 days.
Reminders to KAMs: 'call X because Y days passed'.
Export contacts to Sheets + enrich (e.g. domains, industries).
Extract table from PDF invoice and add to register in Sheets.
Gather data from multiple PDFs (e.g. contracts) and summarize risks.
Transform PDF into 'brief': key points, deadlines, penalties, obligations.
Merge PDFs into package (e.g. for accounting).
Generate PDF report from analysis (executive summary + charts).
Search PDF for specific clauses (SLA, penalties, deadline).
Enhance OCR (if scan) and extract text.
Fill simple PDF form (if supported) with data from spreadsheet.
Do 'Invoice triage': detect missing tax ID, missing number, wrong amounts.
Create PDF report template for client.
Generate sales proposal in DOCX with client data.
Create contract 'draft' in DOCX with parameters (dates, amounts, SLA).
Mass personalization: 30 proposals in DOCX based on CSV.
Fix formatting and styles in existing DOCX.
Create 'Minutes of Meeting' in DOCX with list of decisions.
Convert: DOCX to PDF (if you have pipeline).
Insert price table, terms, attachments automatically.
Create 'policy doc' in company standard with automatic table of contents.
Unify document branding (headers, footers, fonts).
Compare two DOCXs and summarize differences (if supported).
Build financial model (cashflow, runway, scenarios) in Excel.
Create annual budget with departments + expense control.
'Board pack': slides? (more PDF/Docs here) + Excel with data.
Import/export CSV to XLSX + validations.
Excel report with charts (pipeline / KPI / costs).
Pricing calculator: margins, discounts, thresholds.
Sales data analysis: pivot tables, segmentations.
Automatic Excel filling based on PDF invoices.
'Data hygiene': detect errors in spreadsheet and fix them.
Generate multiple forecast versions for sending.
Read receipt/invoice from photo and add to register.
Analyze dashboard screenshot and describe what's wrong / what to fix.
Extract table from photo (OCR) and save to CSV/Sheets.
'UI critique': feedback on page design, CTA, hierarchy.
From error screenshots (stacktrace) extract error and suggest fix.
